original_text: There was a sick woman in the crowd who had lost blood for 12 years. She had paid all her money to doctors and now she had no money. But nobody could help her to become well again.
korean_text: 이에 열두 해를 혈루증으로 앓는 중에 아무에게도 고침을 받지 못하던 여자가

sentences.original_text: There was a sick woman in the crowd
who had lost blood for 12 years
She had paid all her money to doctors
and now she had no money

sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 아무도 그녀를 도울 수 없었습니다
